security.csp: default-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' https://api.bilibili.com https://www.bilibili.com https://passport.bilibili.com https://translate.googleapis.com https://*.hdslb.com https://*.bilivideo.com; img-src 'self' https://*.hdslb.com https://*.bilibili.com data:; media-src 'self' https://*.hdslb.com https://*.bilivideo.com blob:; frame-src https://player.bilibili.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; script-src 'self';

bundle.longDescription: A native Mac app for browsing Bilibili with English translations. Search in English, browse trending content, and enjoy Chinese videos with translated titles and descriptions.
